QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select case when api.label like '%YN'
                then 'FORMYESNO'
                when api.label <> replace(api.label,'Id', 'ID')
                then 'FORMCAPID'
                end child_code,
                    api.application_id,
                    api.page_id,
                    api.last_updated_by,
                    api.last_updated_on,
                    api.item_id component_id,
                    api.item_name,
                    api.item_source_type,
                    api.item_help_text,
                    api.display_as,
                    api.label,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
										null parent_component_id,
	                  api.workspace
            from apex_application_page_items api
            where api.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
	          and api.display_as not in ('Hidden')
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y' 
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Form field `%0` (page %2, app %3) %4',
                          p0 => std.label,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => case when std.child_code ='FORMYESNO'
							  										then 'should not include `YN`'
							  										when std.child_code ='FORMCAPID'
							  										then 'has incorrect capitalization for `ID`'
                                    end
                          ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Form field `%0` is incorrectly formatted (page %2, app %3, item id %4)',
                          p0 => std.label,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
													p4 => std.component_id
                          ) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
		 std.component_id,
		 std.parent_component_id,
		 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION:
Form field labels should be meaningful, formatted and punctuation free :

*   FORMCAPID : Ensure the letters I and D are both capitalized in label like "Service ID, Resource ID, Region ID, etc..." These are incorrect: Service Id, service id, etc...
*   FORMYESNO : Never include YN as part of the label
FIX:
*   FORMCAPID : Correct the capitalization
*   FORMYESNO : correct the label
